# AutomaticSpatialAudio

**Structure**

A spatial audio experience determined by the system.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AutomaticSpatialAudio
```

## Overview

Sounds with an automatic spatial audio experience that belong to an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession] inherit its [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/intendedSpatialExperience-1qwbe].

```swift
// Configure an audio player with an automatic spatial audio experience.
myPlayer.intendedSpatialExperience = .automatic
```

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SpatialAudioExperience
title: AutomaticSpatialAudio
